name: Wake Up (itch) (TurtleDuckProductions)
description:
You play as Lucy, a girl no older than 13, who has woken up in the middle of a hilly forest. Unfortunately, she has no memories of what to do or where to go. Discover the mystery of this area and find out who Lucy truly is.

Special thanks to Victoria Chaney for Lucy's "voice" and Connor Knapik for the Game Theme, Cave Theme, and Credits Theme.

Dev Log:

Requirements Page

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

L-SHIFT/ESC - Pause
